about.description: The “Qalam Masters” platform is a digital solution for automating all processes of a scientific journal: from article submission and peer review to publication and analytics. It brings together authors, reviewers, and editors in one space, ensuring convenience, transparency, and high standards of scientific communication.

ethics.text: The platform supports double-blind peer review, automating the process of assigning reviewers and tracking article status. We ensure compliance with international standards of publication ethics (COPE) and transparency at all stages.
ethics.title: Peer Review and Ethics

history.text: The platform was created as a technological foundation for modern scientific journals striving for quality, efficiency, and international recognition. We maintain high standards and contribute to the development of the scientific community.
history.title: History and Development

mission.text: To promote the development of scientific research and academic dialogue through modern digital tools, simplifying interaction between participants in the publication process and integrating science with practice.

s1.p1: The journal publishes articles on relevant issues in various fields of science (humanities, social, technical, natural, etc.). Only previously unpublished works corresponding to the subject area, with scientific novelty, and containing original research results are accepted. Articles can be in Kazakh, Russian, or English.
s1.structure_value: title, abstract, keywords, main points, introduction, aim, materials and methods, results and discussion, conclusion, funding information (if available), references.
s1.title: 1. General Provisions
s1.volume_value: 5 to 10 pages including all materials. Each article must include UDC and MRNTI.

s2.forbidden_value: page numbering, page breaks, automatic footnotes, hyphenation, letter-spacing adjustments.

items.font: Font: Times New Roman, 12 pt, line spacing — single
items.indent: Paragraph indent — 1.25 cm (without Tab or spaces)
items.margins: Margins: top/bottom — 20 mm, left — 30 mm, right — 15 mm

s2.title: 2. Technical Requirements

items.multilingual: Information must be duplicated in Kazakh, Russian, and English
items.title: Article title — uppercase, bold, centered
items.udc_mrnti: Upper left corner — UDC, below it — MRNTI

items.charts: Charts and diagrams — in Microsoft Excel, inserted as object
items.eq_numbers: Equation numbers — at the right margin in parentheses
items.formulas: Formulas — in Microsoft Equation, italic, centered
items.images: Images — with captions below, resolution at least 300 dpi
items.tables: Tables with numbers and titles above them

s5.text: References must be numbered in order of mention, formatted according to GOST 7.1-2003 and GOST 7.32-2017. In-text citations in square brackets: [3], [5,7].
s5.title: 5. References

items.permission: Attach permission to publish confidential materials if required
items.responsibility: Author is responsible for data accuracy
